statements: SELECT * FROM routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT starting_location, destination_location FROM routes WHERE carbon_emission_reduction_percent > 0.5;
SELECT starting_location, destination_location, distance_km FROM routes WHERE distance_km BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE starting_location = 'City A' AND destination_location = 'City B';
SELECT route_id, carbon_emission_reduction_percent FROM routes WHERE carbon_emission_reduction_percent < 0.25;
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_id, starting_location, destination_location FROM routes WHERE distance_km > 100;
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE carbon_emission_reduction_percent < 5 ORDER BY distance_km DESC;
SELECT starting_location, destination_location FROM routes WHERE distance_km BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT route_id, starting_location, destination_location, carbon_emission_reduction_percent FROM routes WHERE destination_location = 'City A';
SELECT * FROM transportation_routes ORDER BY distance_km DESC;
SELECT route_id, origin_location, destination_location FROM transportation_routes WHERE origin_location='New York';
SELECT city, country FROM location_data WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT * FROM transportation_routes WHERE distance_km BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY route_id ASC;
SELECT destination_location, origin_location, distance_km FROM transportation_routes WHERE origin_location='San Francisco' OR destination_location='Los Angeles';
SELECT * FROM transportation_routes WHERE distance_km > 100
SELECT origin_location, destination_location FROM transportation_routes WHERE route_id = 3
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE city = 'New York' AND country = 'USA'
SELECT city, country, latitude, longitude FROM location_data ORDER BY country, city
SELECT origin_location, destination_location, distance_km FROM transportation_routes WHERE origin_location = 'Los Angeles'
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE route_id = 100
SELECT origin_location, destination_location FROM routes WHERE distance_in_kms > 500
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC
SELECT routes.route_id, carbon_emission FROM carbon_footprint INNER JOIN routes ON carbon_footprint.route_id = routes.route_id
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_routes FROM routes
SELECT route_id, origin_location, destination_location, distance_in_kms FROM routes WHERE distance_in_kms > 100 ORDER BY distance_in_kms DESC
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE latitude BETWEEN 40.0 AND 50.0 AND longitude BETWEEN -90.0 AND -80.0 ORDER BY location_name

SELECT r.route_id, r.origin_location, r.destination_location, c.carbon_emission FROM routes r INNER JOIN carbon_footprint c ON r.route_id = c.route_id WHERE c.carbon_emission < 50 ORDER BY c.carbon_emission ASC

SELECT l.location_name, r.origin_location, r.destination_location, c.carbon_emission FROM locations l INNER JOIN routes r ON l.location_id = r.route_id INNER JOIN carbon_footprint c ON r.route_id = c.route_id WHERE l.location_name LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY l.location_name
SELECT r.route_id, r.origin_location, r.destination_location, c.carbon_emission FROM routes r LEFT JOIN carbon_footprint c ON r.route_id = c.route_id WHERE c.carbon_emission IS NULL
SELECT * FROM transportation_routes;
SELECT starting_point, ending_point, distance FROM transportation_routes WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT route_id, starting_point, ending_point FROM transportation_routes ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE location_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT starting_point, ending_point, distance FROM transportation_routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM locations WHERE latitude < 40 AND longitude > -100 ORDER BY location_name ASC, latitude DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE fuel_type = 'Electric' AND fuel_efficiency > 30 ORDER BY fuel_efficiency DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT record_id, vehicle_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_records WHERE cost < 500 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT route_id, starting_point, ending_point, distance, carbon_emission FROM transportation_routes WHERE carbon_emission > 0.05 ORDER BY route_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT route_name, distance FROM routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance ASC;
SELECT vehicle_name, fuel_capacity FROM vehicles WHERE fuel_type='Gasoline';
SELECT trip_date, trip_distance FROM trips WHERE trip_distance BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY trip_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT route_name, distance FROM routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT vehicle_name, fuel_type, fuel_capacity FROM vehicles WHERE fuel_type = 'Diesel' LIMIT 5;
SELECT trip_date, trip_distance FROM trips WHERE trip_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY trip_distance DESC;
